it.polimi.se2018.model

Class XmlPatternLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.controller.XmlPatternLoader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PatternLoader

    public class XmlPatternLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements PatternLoader
    This class allows to load pattern cards from xml files contained in a directory.
    Author:
    dvdmff

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      XmlPatternLoader(java.io.File directory)
      Creates a new XmlPatternLoader that can load patterns from xmls contained in the specified directory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • XmlPatternLoader

        public XmlPatternLoader(java.io.File directory)
                 throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Creates a new XmlPatternLoader that can load patterns from xmls contained in the specified directory.

        It also loads the xsd file which pattern definitions are checked against.

        Parameters:
        directory - The directory that contains the xmls.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the specified directory isn't actually a directory or it isn't readable.
        org.xml.sax.SAXException - if sax validator or sax parser cannot be used.

    • Method Detail

      • load

        public Pattern[] load(int n)
        Tries to load n unique patterns from the pattern directory.

        If there are not enough valid patterns, the size of the result array is lower tha n.

        Specified by:
        load in interface PatternLoader
        Parameters:
        n - The number of unique patterns to load.
        Returns:
        An array of size at most n containing a set of unique pattern cards.
